thread.title: BRIEF-Atlatsa Resources remains in talks with Anglo American Platinum for funding
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Atlatsa Resources remains in talks with Anglo American Platinum for funding | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Atlatsa Resources remains in talks with Anglo American Platinum for funding
text:
Aug 14 Atlatsa Resources Corp
* Remains in talks with Anglo American Platinum for future sustainability of bokoni mine, potential alternative financial support
* Significant doubt remains regarding company's ability to continue as a going concern Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +91 80 6749 1136)
